name: RCCVirtualSteeringWheel
author: NotAKidoS
description: Allows you to physically grab rigged RCC steering wheels in VR to provide steering input. No explicit setup required other than defining the Steering Wheel transform within the RCC component.
changelog:
- Recompiled for 2025r179
- Fixed generated steering wheel pickup collider not being marked isTrigger
- Fixed error spam when sitting in a CVRSeat with lockControls, but no RCC component in parent
